info.author: Arne Hilmann
info.description:
yum-repos
- serve yum repositories as simple folders
- ... via web server
- offer rest api for
   - create/remove/link of repositories
   - upload/stage/remove of rpms
info.name: yum-repos
info.summary: yum-repos: simple yum repositories with minimal rest api
info.html_description:
yum-repos
- serve yum repositories as simple folders
- ... via web server
- offer rest api for
- create/remove/link of repositories
- upload/stage/remove of rpms
